sqlMap.select: SELECT CODE as code, NAME as name, REG_ID as regId, REG_DATE as regDate, REG_IP as regIp, UPD_ID as updId, UPD_DATE as updDate, UPD_IP as updIp, USEYN as useYn FROM HOBBY ORDER BY CODE
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO HOBBY(CODE, NAME, REG_ID, REG_DATE, REG_IP, UPD_ID, UPD_DATE, UPD_IP, USEYN) VALUES(LPAD(HOBBY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 3, '0'), #name#, #regId#, SYSDATE, #regIp#, #updId#, SYSDATE, #updIp#, #useYn#)
